resources.string:
Excited for PhaseShift? Looking to challenge yourself and win something?
 Utilise the most of your time joining in the fun that sets forth everything you could seek for!!
 Get ready to lose yourself in the world of maths and maps. Pitch in some strategies and use your wit to beat the rest
 Pentagram, the mathematical society of BMSCE in association with Phaseshift 2021 presents to you 'GRIDLOCKED', a fun game with lots of mysteries.
 Let's see how strategic minds pave the way to reach the final treasure, not in the virtual world but the real world.
 So when does the fun begin?
 *Date*: 25th November(online)
 26th November(offline)
 *Event Mode*: Blended
 *Reg fee*: â‚¹100 per team
 *Cash Prize*: â‚¹1250 for winner, â‚¹750 for runner
 Don't miss the opportunity and register soon along with your teammate.

Contact:
 1. Sanath N 7090990293
 2. Anirudh P 8971113227

Exciting prices to be won for both winners and participants!!
 Let the best strategist win!

We, The Mathematical Society of BMSCE, *PENTAGRAM*, are here to engage you in a fun filled event of ours, *INFINITE HUNT*, based on the theme of "SQUID GAME" .

Wait..... You don't have to hunt alone as like in Squid gameðŸ˜‚. You can always have a friend to play with.ðŸ‘¬

So what are you waiting for??..... come out and register with your friend as a team and let's see if u can survive the eliminations.
 Also, stand a chance to win a *Cash prize of Rs.1500* ðŸ’° and *exciting vouchers for all participants* .

Date :
 PRELIMS - 26th November, 2021 ( *ONLINE* )
 SHOWDOWN - 27th November, 2021 ( *OFFLINE* )

Time: Starting at 11 AM on both days.

Registration fees: Rs.100 per team.

For more details visit
